title: New: San Mei – Wars
body:
Having very much grown up through blogs, it’s great to see Gold Coast’s **San Mei** spreading her wings and becoming more and more ambitious with every track she releases.

_Bubblegum_ pop at it’s very best, all self-produced, new track _Wars_ shows that she’s growing into a sound very much her own. Check it out below.

Bubblegum pop at it’s very best, all self-produced, new track Wars shows that she’s growing into a sound very much her own. Check it out below.
